title: Textile, 1850–1900
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Cotton, with cream color background, roller printed in small all-over pattern of vine and dotted ground in brown. Over-printed, probably by blocks in detached pattern of leaf sprays in strong green. The green is chemical or "direct" green. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1850–1900.
1850–1900. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1967-20-31.
